basics.name: Lathashree Harisha
basics.summary: Machine learning engineer with experience in designing, developing and deploying machine learning solutions across various industries.

work.name: Beam (formerly Rovco/Vaarst)
work.summary: Machine Learning engineer working on CV and LLM-based use cases to drive intelligent decision-making by building and deploying robust, scalable ML models for the offshore wind energy sector.

work.name: Sony India Software Centre
work.summary: Senior Engineer working on various critical business problems focused on building reliable and scalable ML systems. Worked on end-to-end ML life cycle from experimentation to productionsing of ML models.

courses: Computer Vision, Machine Learning for Imaging

volunteer.summary: Hackathon conducted for girls aged 7-10 to build confidence and self-esteem in maths and computing. Supported and oversaw various activities and fun technology games using MIT tools for students.

awards.summary: Award for successful cross-functional collaboration on a high-impact project at Sony's 2020 technology event, which was later converted into a product offering for an internal Sony entity.
